areasInvestigacion.descripcion: Research on building general-purpose AI systems that exhibit human-level reasoning, adaptability, and problem-solving across diverse domains.
Exploration of theoretical and computational models of consciousness, aiming to understand if and how machines can develop self-awareness and subjective experience.
Deep learning interpretability and explainability to uncover how models reason and make decisions.
Research on responsible AI development, focusing on fairness, transparency, accountability, and alignment with human values in machine learning systems.
Research on intelligent agents that learn through interaction, optimization, and long-term reward.
Exploring brain-inspired architectures to bridge artificial intelligence and cognitive science.
